channel.title: Comments on: You’ll never guess how this ended. Lol Tactical conquest can be brutal sometimes!
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: 21574
item.description: Pssshh tell me about it. I was having a great time all throughout the day playing but the last 5-6 matches have been just hard to handle. Took a beating for 6 in a row man. Makes a man wanna scream lolol
item.content:encoded: Pssshh tell me about it. I was having a great time all throughout the day playing but the last 5-6 matches have been just hard to handle. Took a beating for 6 in a row man. Makes a man wanna scream lolol

item.title: By: S3niorChi3f
item.dc:creator: S3niorChi3f
item.description: Absolutely it was a very tightly contested match the entire time with them pulling away ever so slightly at the end to win 561-0
item.content:encoded: Absolutely it was a very tightly contested match the entire time with them pulling away ever so slightly at the end to win 561-0

item.title: By: SillySinStorm
item.dc:creator: SillySinStorm
item.description: Al Marj and Underground are sweat factories where clans pad their KDs. Don't tend to see them on strategic maps funnily enough.
item.content:encoded: Al Marj and Underground are sweat factories where clans pad their KDs. Don’t tend to see them on strategic maps funnily enough.
